description: 3KEN307/09 Peace Support Operation Training and Institute Capacity Enhancement at the International Peace Support Training Centre

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description:
Output 1: Enhanced Institutional capacity for applied research, training design and management that address PSO needs and peace and security policy development
Output 2: Improved regional multinational and multidimensional PSO and civilian personnel to address the evolving peace and security situations
Output 3: Increased capacity of regional police deployed in PSO in Eastern Africa or wider Africa
Output 4: Enhanced regional standby capacity of civilian experts for peacekeeping missions and peace building  elements  of the EASF and African Union Security Architecture
Output 5: Operation of Project Management Unit
subproject.title: 7KEN09701Peace Support Operati
